name: Vehicle Buster: Car Chase Game
description:
Vehicle buster is an Offline car chase game and is one of the fastest car chase game where you escape and destroy the enemy vehicle for as long time as possible.  Choose from various vehicle that include cars, scooter to get away from enemy and collect buster coins which is can be used to upgrades vehicle. Health are scattered over places to enhance health of your car. Buy new cars and upgrade these cars to their full potential to enjoy the most out of the game.

Features
* 7 unlockable cars.
* Each car with different speed and steering capabilities.
* Upgardable cars.
* Each car levels can be uniquely adjusted thus having multiple option to 
   choose.
* Present with secret amount of coin are available around the map.

New Updates
*Christmas Theme added to the game.
*In game price which when collected car give more coins.
*Better control of the cars.
* New Playground Mode.
*New easy interface.
*level of the car can be adjected according to need.

Play now

 cheese seamless texture for floor https://www.freepik.com/vectors/background"
